featured.text: In 1498, Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama made the first sea voyage to India, via the southernmost tip of Africa.
When the Spanish explorers went to Mexico, they saw the Aztec kings 15 umbrellas.
English explorers found out that Indian princes also carried umbrellas on the east coast of North America.

definition.en_def: A person who investigates unknown regions or seeks out new experiences.
definition.example: The explorer set out on a journey to discover uncharted territories.
